definitions.title: stubble, chaff
definitions.body: ;—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ex 5:12 +, [[קַָשׁ]] Ex 15:7;—lit. as acc. cogn. ´[[לְקשֵׁשׁ ק]]: [[לַתֶּבֶן]] Ex 5:12 (J); in sim., as inflammable, Ex 15:7, Is 5:24, Is 47:14, Na 1:10, Jn 2:5, so in metaph. Is 33:11, Ob:Ob 18, Mal 3:19; in sim., as driven by wind Is 40:24, Is 41:2, Je 13:24, Ps 83:14; fig. of the worthless Job 13:25, of harmless trifles Job 41:20, Job 41:21.
